basic.description: This course explores topics such as current, voltage, and power; resistors, inductors, and capacitors; network theorems and laws; operational amplifiers, phasors; impedances; sinusoidal steady-state analysis.
basic.subject: EEL
basic.title: Introductory Circuit Analysis

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: MAC 2312. Corequisites: MAC 2313 and PHY 2049C.
